title: Modern 1 bed in South End ~NO FEE~
posting_body: ['Modern 1 bed in luxury building minutes from grocery stores, shops, restaurants, entertainment, major highways, and public transportation.', 'Live in the heart of the South End!', '*Rent shown is based on 14 month lease, which is the best rate.', 'Different lease terms will have different monthly rates.', 'Furnished apartments available at premium.', 'Ask for details.', 'Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for more info or to schedule a tour!', 'APARTMENT FEATURES:', 'White/grey on grey finish package', 'Courtyard view', 'Pool view', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Tile backsplash', 'Italian cabinetry', 'Washer and dryer', 'Smart home package', 'Keyless entry', 'Barn doors', 'Premium bathroom fixtures', 'USB outlets', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', '24-hour package lockers', 'Concierge services', 'Conference rooms', 'Controlled-access building', 'Deposit free with Rhino', 'Elevator', '24-hour Fitness center', 'Build credit score with RentTrack', 'Moving services with Move Matcher', 'On-site storage', 'Private landscaped courtyard', 'Resident app', 'Rooftop grilling area', 'Rooftop terrace', 'PARKING:', 'Motorcycle Parking - Reserved: $100/month', 'Parking Garage - Reserved: $500-$600/month', 'Garage Parking: $420/month', 'PETS:', 'Dogs: $135/month/dog.', '3 Dogs max/apartment', 'Cats: $100/month/cat.', '3 cats max/apartment', 'UTILITIES:', 'Resident pays Water/Sewer (approx $30/month) +', 'Electricity + Cable/Internet (Verizon or Xfinity).', 'Trash removal included in rent']
